work.name: Lydia
work.summary:
Back-end development and design of micro-services (Golang/Php), deployed on GCP. Objective is to split existing monoliths and modernize services. Development and maintenance of legacy stacks (Php/Symfony)
Eng. management of a team of five developers within the “payment” squad.
Domains: payment, fraud, credit card, PCI/DSS, transactions, SEPA
Stack: Golang, Symfony, Postgres/Mariadb, Redis, PubSub, RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch, Docker, Kubernetes

work.name: Enigmatic - Prospectiva
work.summary:
Full-stack development with Symfony of several HR/Interim dematerialization platforms.
R&D and implementation of  CQRS and event-sourcing systems in modern and legacy applications.
Project management, agile methods (Scrum/Kanban), technical supervision of developers, development of internal libraries, code reviews.
Stack: Symfony/ApiPlatform, VueJS/React, Mariadb, Redis, RabbitMQ, ElasticSearch,Docker

work.name: Dalenys
work.summary:
Full-stack development of an e-mailing routing platform that manages 12 email databases.
development of queuing and batch processing workers
Campaign creation, deliverability, tracking, statistical interface, tracking for SMS sending campaigns
Internal/external APIs and registration/modification/unsubscribe webservices; front office ergonomy
Participation in the redesign of a community site: development of modules, integration, optimizations.
Development of administration modules, creation of e-mail campaigns, administration of co-registration, optimizations (consoclient.com/ eperflex.com)
Stack: Laravel, Mysql, Redis, Beanstalkd, Python, Javascript

Back-end development and integration of management tools, statistics and backoffice modules for communication agencies and NGOs.
Development and front-end integration of registration modules, membership, online payment. Various integrations for several customers (sites, newsletters); email campaign management and statistical monitoring.
Stack: PHP, CMS(wordpress/spip), Mysql, Javascript, Python
